entry.title: proback/BeyondMLR
entry.summary:
Repo for January 2021 version of Beyond Multiple Linear Regression: Applied Generalized Linear Models and Multilevel Models in R. The rendered version can be found at: https://bookdown.org/roback/bookdown-BeyondMLR/

BeyondMLR

Repo for January 2021 version of Beyond Multiple Linear Regression: Applied Generalized Linear Models and Multilevel Models in R. The rendered version can be found at: https://bookdown.org/roback/bookdown-BeyondMLR/, and hard copies can be purchased through CRC Press or on Amazon

entry.title: skeydan/Deep-Learning-and-Scientific-Computing-with-R-torch
entry.summary:
Deep Learning and Scientific Computing with R torch

This is the repository for the book Deep Learning and Scientific Computing with R torch, written by Sigrid Keydana and published by CRC Press.

Please note that this work is written under a Contributor Code of Conduct, and the online version is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. By participating in this project (for example, by submitting an issue with suggestions or edits) you agree to abide by its terms.

entry.summary:
trilinos-paper

This repository is to coordinate the writing of the Trilinos paper.
